75690,75729 +------------+-+--------------+-+-------

92627,92727 pcccp
92728,92880 pcccp # TODO
92881,92943 ccppc # TODO
92944,92972 pcccp # TODO

# bottom field is bad in the first two, top field is bad in the last two of every five frames 
# 0t 1t 2t 2t 3t 4t 5t
# 0b 1b 2b 3b 4b 4b 5b
# instead of cccppc... (0 1 2 2 3 4 ...), we can do cccuuc... (0 1 2 3 4 4 ...) 
# where 1 and 3 are still bad, but 0 is a dup and 2/4 are good, so we swap one bad for a good frame
92973,93425 cccuu
92973,93426 -+--- # 1 will look nicer, cannot do anything about 3, yadif would use the bad field
93121,93247 +-++- # uuccc + ccppc (sfx on the brains partially overlap)
93121,93247 Q 6
93426 c # last frame cannot be a u
93426 +
93426 Q 6
